extendedInfo.description: "Once you get into exploring its awesome depths, you will be surprised to see how hard-hitting and legitimately utilitarian it is for all music lovers." [OneClickRoot.com]Please try the free version first to see if it works.Bass Booster Pro is a standalone app, so you should uninstall the free version to avoid conflicts.The Pro features of Bass Booster include : - Unlimited custom presets - Homescreen widget (2x1) - Homescreen shortcut (see below) - Virtualizer - Start on phone boot - Preset auto-detection (see below) - Automatic preset on incoming call/SMS or during phone conversations - 4 themes - Music visualizer - Reverb (in Beta ! It doesn't work on most phones, so it might be removed)- 20 built-in presets : More Basses, Improve quality, Electro, Techno, Dubstep, Dance, Pop, Rock, Metal, Reggae, Rap, R&B, Hip-Hop, Jazz, Latino, Acoustic, Classical, Party, Voice Boost, Volume Boost. (included in the free version)Homescreen Shortcut :This feature allows you to create a 1x1 homescreen shortcut that'll change Bass Booster settings in one click without even opening the app ! (see screenshots) Preset auto-detection :This feature allows presets to be automatically adjusted according to the music that is being played. Let's say that you're listening to some Alternative Rock music, by default, Bass Booster will automatically choose the Rock preset, but if you create a custom "Rock" preset, yours will be selected. But it goes even further ! For example, you could create a "Punk Rock" preset and a "Hard Rock" preset and they would be automatically selected. (Android 2.3.3+) You can also create a preset specifically for a song, album or artist and it will be auto-detected next time you play a matching song. This is very useful for volume normalization among others.Auto-detection requires to use : - A compatible player - Locally stored and tagged audio filesPlayers that support auto-detection : - The stock player by Google - Google Play Music - Player Pro (recommended) - JetAudio Player  - RealPlayer - Poweramp - Rocket Music Player - NRG Player - Music Folder Player - MortPlayer - TTPod Music Mod - Meridian - Â³ (Cubed) - DoubleTwist (enable Last.FM scrobbling in DoubleTwist) - Winamp (enable Scrobbling and install the Last.FM app).This list is not complete : other media players may work.If your player doesn't work, try to enable Last.FM Scrobbling in the settings of your media player. For Winamp and some others players, you have to install Last.FM. It it still doesn't work, drop us a mail and we'll see if support can be addedPermissions : - Receive messages : To automatically set a preset if there's an incoming SMS. - Read phone state : To automatically set a preset if there's an incoming call. - Read external storage : Needed for preset auto-detection on some devicesDisclaimer : We are not responsible for anything that might happen to your phone, your audio device or yourself ! Do not listen at full volume or with bass boost for too long. This app can damage your devices or hearing. Use it wisely !This software is provided by the copyright holders and contributors "as is" and any express or implied warranties, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose are disclaimed. In no event shall the copyright owner or contributors be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, or consequential damages (including, but not limited to, procurement of substitute goods or services; loss of use, data, or profits; or business interruption) however caused and on any theory of liability, whether in contract, strict liability, or tort (including negligence or otherwise) arising in any way out of the use of this software, even if advised of the possibility of such damage.Thanks to Svengraph for the headphones : http://svengraph.deviantart.com/

reviews.title: great!!
reviews.comment: I am a guy who really likes bass and to change the my music sounds...well this app does it all! It is the perfect app well worth the price, I downloaded the free version first, and then bought pro about 5 mins later. Thanks for a great app
reviews.author: Matthew K

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: After hearing the free version I had to buy this and ive heard all of them being an avid audiophiliac this is definitely the best by far. Overall very impressed.
reviews.author: danny adler

reviews.title: F I N A L L Y!
reviews.comment: Thank you for this wonderful app, now I can hear music sound the way I like.  Hoping for more theme colors.
reviews.author: Faye M

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: As a music producer this app is pretty good. Does increase the bass in song. I currently have some cheap headphones but once I some higher end ones I know this app is going to be killer
reviews.author: Robert Ramirez

reviews.title: Amazing when paired with good equipment.
reviews.comment: I tested this app with several BT audio components (Soundbar and Car audio) and a pair of Bose ear buds and you have to be a bit conservative when boosting or there is distortion. But when paired used with good headphones (Using Denon HP-1000s) it is insane. I thought my head was going to explode.
reviews.author: Paul Bennett

reviews.title: Epic
reviews.comment: I use audiobeats earphones on my HTC one and thought the quality was very high when using deezer, downloaded this app and the improvement is unbelievable. Perfect for someone who likes a slightly deeper bass. Without a doubt the best app I have downloaded. Absolutely immense. Massive must for any music enthusiasts, well worth the price.
reviews.author: Jonny Stamper

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its good but for my LG Smart phone im missing tonnes of the button e.g the setting buttons but its not a bad app
reviews.author: Chris Armstrong

reviews.title: Finally !!!
reviews.comment: Its about time someone steps up, and makes the BEST bass app. One request the green glow on the bottom, could yall make it go with the music all the way across, not just to the left.
reviews.author: jaime bustos

reviews.title: Works and sounds great
reviews.comment: Well worth purchasing. Adds an audio dynamic to all my music that wasn\'t there before. Enjoying. Problem is it resets itself during some songs. Disabled the 10 second reset, but continues to reset itself at seemingly unpredictable times. Kinda of hassle when it does it in the middle of a set at the gym.
reviews.author: Mario Ordorica

reviews.title: Excellent equalizer
reviews.comment: Amazing awesome wonderful extravaganza fantastic works perfectly fine great job thanks to all the developers thank you so much keep improving
reviews.author: Danny Roque

reviews.title: The Bees Knees!
reviews.comment: Okay, so the free version blew my mind with deeeeeeep Bass (EQ) and runs with all audio on my device. But woah, the paid version steps it up to the big times! So now I have an amazing Bass Booster, but the fact it has a built in Virtualization (which actually works) is great.... but wait, there\'s More!  Here is why it instantly became one of my top 10 favorites.   The feature of auto setting call volume EQ!!!! Wow! so now my bluetooth sounds great and I can control each call to my liking!  love this app!!!
reviews.author: Thy Victor

reviews.title: U got to have it
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Efrain Cortes

reviews.title: I bought the PRO version I\'m confused
reviews.comment: No instructions in how to manage it, I\'m not complaining but can get some kind of instruction in how to control more VOLUME that\'s the reason why I purchased the PRO  version, I will rate when guide included. Thank you
reviews.author: Edgar Martinez

reviews.title: Delivers!
reviews.comment: Bass Booster Pro really enhances the sound of my music, especially through a good set of headphones. Thanks for a top notch app Dev!
reviews.author: Brian Walke

reviews.title: Thought it was cool enough to buy
reviews.comment: After purchasing this I found that the audio was enhanced nicely. After a few days I began to notice it was causing problems with several of my music and media apps. It shuts down often along with forcing my other media apps to close with it. Secondly there\'s no \'off\' \'exit\' function to not have it constantly running in the background short of unchecking the bass booster and EQ while also sliding off the virtualizer. The reverb does absolutely nothing. I\'ll keep my eye on this app but it needs more work.
reviews.author: Vini DelNegro

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Decided to buy. Seems to do fine with my Motorola Android 3g! Thanks!
reviews.author: Dwayne Farmer

reviews.title: Not working with Samsung s4 qualcomm
reviews.comment: The booster works for a few minutes and then shuts itself off.  Please fix it.  22.08.2013 Update:   Thanks for your suggestions but it\'s still not working for me. I\'v tested it  on several different roms and sadly the problem persists.
reviews.author: Carsten Kayser

reviews.title: Volume is too low
reviews.comment: The bass is a bit improved, but it makes the total volume really low..not worth it
reviews.author: Minh Truong

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love this app
reviews.author: tj Walker

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good.
reviews.author: Michael Hall
